exceptions.tactic: intros Q p1 p2 H1 H2 r H3 H4.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
Applied theorem does not have enough premises.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p1 p2 : list (Term A n)), reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p1 p2 -> forall r : list (Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM p1 -> canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> exists s : list (Term A n), reduceplus Q (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p1 r) s /\ reduceplus Q (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p2 r) s

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
canonical : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive reduceplus (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop := Rstar_0 : forall x y : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n x y -> reduceplus Q x y | Rstar_n : forall x y z : list (Term A n), reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x y -> reduceplus Q y z -> reduceplus Q x z Arguments reduceplus (_ _ _)%list_scope Arguments Rstar_0 (_ _ _)%list_scope Arguments Rstar_n (_ _ _ _)%list_scope

pluspf_minuspf_id : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q) q) p
minusP_is_plusP_mults : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n r (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) q))
mults_dist_pluspf : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (mults multA (n:=n) a (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p q)) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) a q))
plusP_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall p q r s : list (Term A n), plusP A A0 eqA plusA n ltM p q r ->...-> eqP A eqA n r s
pluspf_is_minuspf : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p q) (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) q))
reducehead_imp_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q
reducetop_sp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q)
reduceplus_mults_invf0 : forall a : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a (T1 A1 n) -> forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p q : list (Term A n)), reduceplus Q p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> forall r s : list (Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n p (mults multA (n:=n) a r) -> eqP A eqA n q (mults multA (n:=n) a s) -> reduceplus Q r s

```coq
intros Q p1 p2 H1 H2 r H3 H4.
destruct H1.
- exists p1. split.
  + assumption.
  + apply Rstar_0. assumption.
- destruct H3 as [p3 [H5 [H6 H7]]].
  destruct H4 as [p4 [H8 [H9 H10]]].
  exists p3. split.
  + assumption.
  + eapply Rstar_n.
    * eassumption.
    * apply H5.
```

original: intros Q p1 p2 H1 H2 r H3 H4. destruct H1. - exists p1. split. + auto. + apply Rstar_0. auto. - destruct H3 as [p3 [H5 [H6 H7]]]. destruct H4 as [p4 [H8 [H9 H10]]]. exists p3. split. + auto. + eapply Rstar_n. * eauto. * apply H5.
